name: Money Jump
description:
Title: Money Jump 

Platform: PC 

Genre: 

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

 Overview: The game is very simple. You press Up to jump to different blocks. Along the way you also are collecting money to up your score. If you fall you must restart.

Instructions: 

Click Up to Start

After failure press Enter to Restart 

Game Designer - Zayid Bethune
